title: APAT - Advanced Programming Admission Test | CodingBlocks

openGraph.title: Up to 95% scholarship on Coding Blocks Classroom and Online courses
openGraph.description: Coding Blocks is proud to introduce to you CAST and APAT, the Scholarship Tests for Basic and Advanced courses. Coding Blocks conducts these scholarship tests for our basic courses - Data structures and algorithms using C++, Java and Python App development course, and for our advanced batches - Web Development, Android Development, Machine Learning and Competitive Coding. In CAST, students will be tested on their analytical and logical reasoning skills and scholarships worth up to 95% will be on offer. In APAT, students will be tested on their coding and algorithmic skills and scholarships worth up to 95% will be on offer.
